overview: This DVD contains a true rarity, a film made in 1970 in the home of Finnish composer Ilkka Kussisto (whose two sons are famous violinists) when the Bill Evans Trio visited him for a private performance. Also includes the bonus film: The Universal Mind Of Bill Evans: Bill Evans, solo piano and in conversation with Harry Evans. New York 1966. Jazz Shots.
title: Bill Evans Trio In Helsinki 1970
